basics.name: clusterName
basics.label: Cluster name
basics.toolTip: The name of the HDInsight cluster.

constraints.validationMessage: Cluster names must be between 3 and 24 characters long, and can contain only numbers and lowercase letters.

basics.name: clusterLoginUserName
basics.label: Cluster Login User Name
basics.toolTip: Cluster login username for the HDInsight or Ambari.

constraints.validationMessage: The password must be at least 8 characters in length and must contain at least one digit, one non-alphanumeric character, one upper case letter and one lower case letter. Also, the password should not contain 3 consecutive letters from the username

basics.name: sshUserName
basics.label: SSH User Name
basics.toolTip: SSH credentials can be used to remotely access the cluster.

basics.name: timeZone
basics.label: Time Zone of Data Sources
basics.toolTip: Your DataSource timezone is required for few functionalities to work.

elements.name: clusterNodeCount
elements.label: Number of Worker Nodes
elements.toolTip: The limit on the number of cluster nodes varies among Azure subscriptions. You can contact azure support to work on these limits.

elements.name: workerNodeVmSize
elements.label: Worker Nodes
elements.toolTip: The size of virtual machine to provision for each cluster node.

elements.name: headNodeVmSize
elements.label: Head Nodes
elements.toolTip: The size of virtual machine to provision for each cluster node.

elements.name: zookeeperVmSize
elements.label: Zookeeper Node
elements.toolTip: The size of virtual machine to provision for each cluster node.

elements.name: edgenodeVmSize
elements.label: Infoworks Edge Node
elements.toolTip: The size of virtual machine to provision for infoworks node.
